---
name: "User-Created Events"
about: "Allow users to create their own events, not just sign up for existing ones."
title: "Feature: User-Created Events"
labels: [enhancement]
---

**Summary:**
Enable students or teachers to create new extracurricular activities/events directly from the web interface.

**Details:**
- Add a form for users to submit new events (name, description, schedule, max participants, category, location, etc.).
- New events should appear in the activities list and be available for sign-up.
- Optionally, add moderation or approval for new events.

**Benefit:**
Empowers the community to organize more diverse activities and reduces admin overhead.
